name: Birb net
description:
Just a little game i wanted to make after being burnt out on pengi game and birdguy challenge

CONTROLS - CHRIPY

W - UP | A - LEFT | S - DOWN | D - RIGHT

Q - use chip | E - mini bullet

P - change rooms

CONTROLS - ATK SELECT

ENTER - open/close

W - UP | A - LEFT | S - DOWN | D - RIGHT

Q - select chip
